person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Simec , the steelmaking arm of the debt-ridden Sidek group headed the losers , off 7 centavos ( 1 cent ) at 1.40 pesos ( 18 cents ) .

Let's think step by step.

1. Simec - the steelmaking arm of the debt-ridden Sidek group
2. Sidek group - headed the debt-ridden group to which Simec belongs

Both Simec and Sidek group are "Person" entities as they are organizations that have a legal existence and can engage in business activities.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

1. Simec - the steelmaking arm of the debt-ridden Sidek group

The Sidek group is not a person entity, but Simec is a steelmaking arm of the Sidek group, so it is a person entity.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

organization.content:
Please identify the "Organization" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Simec , the steelmaking arm of the debt-ridden Sidek group headed the losers , off 7 centavos ( 1 cent ) at 1.40 pesos ( 18 cents ) .

Let's think step by step.

1. Simec: This is the first organization mentioned in the paragraph. It is the steelmaking arm of the Sidek group.
2. Sidek group: This is the second organization mentioned in the paragraph. It is the parent group of Simec and is described as debt-ridden.

Therefore, the "Organization" entities in the paragraph are Simec and Sidek group.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Organization.

1. Simec
2. Sidek group

These are the two entities that clearly refer to organizations in the paragraph. The other entities mentioned, such as "centavos" and "pesos," are units of currency and not organizations.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
